import React, {useState} from 'react' import { motion } from 'framer-motion' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { containerAnim, shadowAnim } from '../animations' import { listSongDetails,createSongReview } from '../actions/songActions' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { SONG_CREATE_REVIEW_RESET } from '../constants/songConstants' const Reviews = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() document.body.style.overflow = "hidden" const [rating, setRating] = useState(0) const [comment, setComment] = useState("") window.addEventListener('popstate', function(event) { // document.body.style.overflow = "auto" }) const exitDetailHandler = (e) => { const element = e.target if(element.classList.contains("rshadow")){ document.body.style.overflowY = "auto" navigate(`/`) // navigate(-1) } } return (
) } export default Reviews
